original_text: Who hath given him a charge over the earth? or who hath disposed the whole world?
korean_text: 누가 땅을 그에게 맡겼느냐 누가 온 세상을 그에게 맡겼느냐

sentences.original_text: Who hath given him a charge over the earth?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그에게 땅에 대한 책임을 맡겼는가?

sentences.original_text: or who hath disposed the whole world?
